actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: Joint resolution to establish the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire land in order to establish the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge within the Owen River watershed area, California. Declares that the tule elk shall be deemed a species of wildlife threatened with extinction for purposes of the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 4601-9)

titles.title: Joint resolution to establish the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge.
